name: bingenotes
description: A webapp for watching shows and getting suggestions based on your series.

scripts.build:js: bash -c "browserify src/index.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015, react ] ] && npm run uglify"
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && (npm run build:css && npm run build:js )
scripts.start: bash -c "(npm run server & npm run watch)"

author: Julius Rajala
